fields.label: Default to Yearly?
fields.name: default_to_yearly
fields.instructions: Enable this to show yearly pricing on load.

fields.label: Enable Compact View?
fields.name: enable_compact_view
fields.instructions: Display a compact pricing grid with less information.

fields.label: Enable Term Switch?
fields.name: enable_term_switch
fields.instructions: Show an interactive switch to switch between monthly and yearly plans.

fields.label: Force Promo?
fields.name: force_promo
fields.instructions: Show promo regardless of the smux_login cookie.

fields.label: Pricing Term Suffix
fields.name: pricing_term_suffix
fields.instructions: Select if indicated pricing is on a "Per Year" or "Per Month" term.

sub_fields.label: Exclude Plan?
sub_fields.name: exclude_plan
sub_fields.instructions: Exclude this plan from the promo?

sub_fields.label: Monthly Banner Image
sub_fields.name: monthly_banner_image
sub_fields.instructions: If an image is uploaded, it will replace the default promotional banner.

sub_fields.label: Monthly Banner Subtext
sub_fields.name: monthly_banner_subtext
sub_fields.instructions: This text will show below the banner image, if left blank, no text will show below the banner image.

sub_fields.label: Yearly Banner Image
sub_fields.name: yearly_banner_image
sub_fields.instructions: If an image is uploaded, it will replace the default promotional banner.

sub_fields.label: Yearly Banner Subtext
sub_fields.name: yearly_banner_subtext
sub_fields.instructions: This text will show below the banner image, if left blank, no text will show below the banner image.

sub_fields.label: Monthly Price
sub_fields.name: monthly_price
sub_fields.instructions: Promotional price for the monthly plan.

sub_fields.label: Include Monthly Price Asterisk?
sub_fields.name: include_monthly_price_asterisk
sub_fields.instructions: Include * at the end of the price to reference further details.

sub_fields.label: Monthly Price Subtext
sub_fields.name: monthly_price_subtext
sub_fields.instructions:
Subtext below the plan price.
For the tooltip use:
<span class="show-tooltip">Hover Text Here <span class="hover-tooltip">Tooltip Text Here</span></span>

sub_fields.name: yearly_price
sub_fields.instructions: Promotional price for the yearly plan.

sub_fields.instructions: Include * at the end of the price to reference further details.

sub_fields.instructions:

fields.label: Base Pricing Info
fields.name: base_pricing_info
fields.instructions: CSV output of Pricing Table information for this region. This remains persistent regardless of whether or not a Promo is enabled.

fields.label: Price disclaimer align
fields.name: price_disclaimer_align
